name: Beginner's "Pride"
desc:
+2 damage when foe cannot counter.
-2 damage taken when not countering.
components: 2 if mode == 'attack' and not combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit, item, unit2, item2) else 0
2 if mode != 'attack' and not combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit2, item2, unit, item) else 0
